Row.Text: {1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} is constructing {4_WonderOrProject} in one of their cities.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} has bought votes for the upcoming world congress session from {4_PlayerName}.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} has sold some of their votes for the upcoming world congress session to {4_PlayerName}.
{2_ResourceName:textkey} is now available in {1_CityName:textkey}! This increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building pre-Industrial Era Wonders in this city by {3_Num}%!
Because you are burning their city to the ground, partisans have spawned near {1_Name}!
Because your captured city is being burned to the ground, friendly partisans have spawned near {1_Name}!
Because you are at war with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}, they have revoked quests previously offered to you. The war must end before they will offer you quests again.
Because the City of {1_CityName:textkey} has {2_Population} [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens, a {3_Unit} has been conscripted!
The conquered City-State of {1_CivName:textkey} has given you a new Unit!
The great wealth brought back by your {1_UnitType} has led your empire to celebrate "We Love the King Day" for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turns!

Your {1_UnitType} journeyed to a far-off land and discovered [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR]! [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{3_Num}[ENDCOLOR] copies of this Resource were given to you in honor of your patronage.

Your {1_UnitType} increased your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence in {3_CivShortDesc} by [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR], and reduced the Influence of all Major Civilizations known to the City-State by the same amount! Your minimum [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with the City-State has also increased by [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{4_Num}[ENDCOLOR]!

A {1_UnitType} increased {4_OwnerAdj} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence in {3_CivShortDesc} by [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR], and reduced your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence in the City-State by the same amount! Their minimum [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with the City-State has also increased by [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{5_Num}[ENDCOLOR]!
Expending {1_UnitName} increased your Military Unit Supply Cap by {2_Num}!

Your musicians were happily received by the {1_PlayerAdj} people. You gain +[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them, and +{3_num} [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
{1_PlayerAdj} musicians recently toured your empire, and were warmly received. {1_PlayerAdj} [ICON_TOURISM] Cultural Influence over you has increased by [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR].

Your musicians were happily received by the {1_PlayerAdj} people. You gain +[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50%[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all Civs for {2_Num} Turns, and +[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]100%[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with the target Civ for {2_Num} Turns.

{1_PlayerAdj} musicians recently toured your empire, and were warmly received. {2_Player} gains +[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]100%[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with you for [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{3_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turns.
You control over 50% of the World's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR], and therefore have a Global Monopoly![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_ResourceHelp}

{3_CivName} {3_CivName: plural 1?controls; other?control;} over 50% of the World's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR], and therefore {3_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} a Global Monopoly![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_ResourceHelp}
{2_CivName} {2_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} a Global Monopoly on [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR]!

You [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]no longer have[ENDCOLOR] a Global Monopoly on [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR]![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lost:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_ResourceHelp}
You control over 25% of the World's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR], and therefore have a Strategic Monopoly![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_ResourceHelp}

{3_CivName} {3_CivName: plural 1?controls; other?control;} over 25% of the World's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR], and therefore has a Strategic Monopoly![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_ResourceHelp}
{2_CivName} {2_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} a Strategic Monopoly on [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR]!

You [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]no longer have[ENDCOLOR] a Strategic Monopoly on [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ResourceNames}[ENDCOLOR]![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lost:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_ResourceHelp}

{1_Player} has begun constructing the [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Building}[ENDCOLOR], and will complete it in [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{3_Turns}[ENDCOLOR] {1_Num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;}! When completed, {1_Player} will achieve a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Cultural Victory[ENDCOLOR]!
Because you have reached the {1_EraName}, you may now create vassals!
Facing near certain defeat, {1_TeamName} has surrendered as a vassal to our great civilization.
Recognizing your great strength, {1_TeamName} has agreed to accept your protection as your vassal.
You are now the vassal of {1_TeamName}!
You have surrendered your political independence in exchange for {1_TeamName}'s protection as their vassal.
{1_PlyrName} has acquired {2_PlyrName} as a new vassal.
After long deliberations, we have agreed to grant {1_TeamName}'s people their freedom.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]They are no longer our Vassal.[ENDCOLOR]

The treacherous dogs led by {1_TeamName} have taken up arms against our empire! They have declared their independence, and are willing to fight to the death to defend their claim.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]They are no longer our Vassal.[ENDCOLOR]
You are no longer the vassal of {1_TeamName}!
We have been granted liberation from {1_TeamName}! We are no longer bound to their political alignment and are free to pursue our own interests.
Viva la revolution! Our people have taken up arms to defend our country's right to independence from {1_TeamName}'s rule!
{1_TeamName} has increased your taxes from {2_Num}% to {3_Num}%!
{1_TeamName} has decreased your taxes from {2_Num}% to {3_Num}%!
Because they have been our vassal for many years, we are now able to liberate {1_TeamName}!
Because you have entered a new Era, your Vassal {1_TeamName} has sent {2_Num} {2_Num: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} to {3_CityName} as part of their tribute.
{1_PlayerName} has conquered {2_CityName} and restored {3_CivAdj} sovereignty. The flame of the {4_CivName}, once extinguished, burns again. {4_CivName} is now the vassal of {1_PlayerName}.
{1_PlyrName} is no longer the vassal of {2_PlyrName}!
Founding a new City has reset the cost increase of Tile purchases in all owned cities!
Your soldiers found information worth {1_Num} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science during the conquest of {2_Name}!

The creation of a [ICON_GREAT_WORK] Great Work causes all Cities to enter "We Love the Empress Day" for {1_Num} Turns, increasing their [ICON_FOOD] Growth by +{2_Num}%! All Cities gain +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
The founding of a new City causes all Cities to enter "We Love the Empress Day" for {1_Num} Turns, increasing their [ICON_FOOD] Growth by +{2_Num}%! All Cities gain +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
The conquest of a City causes all Cities to enter "We Love the Empress Day" for {1_Num} Turns, increasing their [ICON_FOOD] Growth by +{2_Num}%! All Cities gain +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
Because {1_Resource:textkey} is connected to your trade network, the City of {2_CityName:textkey} enters "We Love the Empress Day" for {3_Num} Turns, increasing its [ICON_FOOD] Growth by +{4_Num}%!
Entering a new Era has led to instability and the rise of a new ruling dynasty. Bonus [ICON_FOOD] Food from Mandate of Heaven is halved in all Cities.
The City of {1_CityName:textkey} wants {2_ResourceName:textkey}! Connecting that resource to your trade network will cause the city to enter "We Love the Empress Day."

Due to the birth of {4_UnitName:textkey}, your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] Great Writer Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST] Artist Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{3_Num} [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN] Musician Points
{@2_MinorCivName} was bullied recently, and its citizens demand retribution from {1_TargetName:textkey}. If you assist them by going to war with {1_TargetName:textkey}, you will be greatly rewarded.
Citizens of {@1_MinorCivName} are glad to see that you have gone to war on their behalf.

The historians of {@2_CivName} lament that the empires of the world are decadent and over-extended. They state that civilizations which build the {@1_NationalWonderName} will redeem their imperial grandeur, and with it the favor of this city-state.
The leaders of {@3_CivName} want to strengthen their armies. Sending them {TXT_KEY_GRAMMAR_A_AN << {1_UnitName}} with at least {2_XP} XP will redeem their imperial grandeur and gain their favor.

The merchants of {2_CivName:textkey} have heard of a distant city known as {1_TargetName:textkey}. {2_CivName:textkey} is now looking for explorers to help them find this city. If you are able to find it, you will be rewarded.
As {2_CivName:textkey} hoped, you found the city of {1_TargetName:textkey}!

{3_MinorCivName:textkey} is hosting a forum on statecraft, and encourages delegates from all civilizations to attend. Each Diplomatic Mission to them during this time will be more effective, rewarding [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_BoostPercentage}%[ENDCOLOR] more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining} turns remaining.[ENDCOLOR]
The forum in {1_MinorCivName:textkey} has ended. The amount of [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence gained from Diplomatic Missions has returned to normal.
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} is preparing for a festival of nations

The people of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} will host a festival of nations soon. To prepare, they are sending delegations to every major civilization in the known world. The player with the highest [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output after {2_TurnsDuration} turns will undoubtedly impress the delegates the most. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining} turns before the festival opens.[ENDCOLOR]

You have impressed {1_MinorCivName:textkey} with your civilization's [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism! They were underwhelmed by the other civilizations. Civilizations that succeeded (ties are allowed):[NEWLINE]
Another civilization has awed {1_MinorCivName:textkey} with its [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism. Your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism was not enough. Civilizations that succeeded (ties are allowed):[NEWLINE]

A brilliant professor from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} has issued a global request for someone to search for valuable artifacts at a nearby location. The first player to send an archaeologist to study this site will be rewarded.
The professor from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} is excited about the results of your excavation, and asserts that whatever you found most definitely belongs in a museum.

A foreign team of archaeologists was one step ahead of you, and excavated the site near {1_MinorCivName:textkey} first. The professor from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} was impressed by their work, and their influence with the city-state has increased.

The sailors of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} have heard navigators from other civilizations and city-states claim that the earth might be round, and they want you to seek the truth. If you can prove the world is round, your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this city-state will increase.
The sailors of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} are in awe of your adept navigators, and are thrilled to learn that the world is neither flat nor a disc.
Someone else has circumnavigated the world for {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Your navigators are disheartened, and your influence with this city-state does not increase.

Partisans from the conquered city of {1_CityName:textkey} have allied with the leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey}, and request your help in retaking their capital. If you help the partisans from {1_CityName:textkey} liberate their capital, your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with both City-States will increase greatly.
The leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} praise your heroic deeds, and thank you for liberating {1_CityName:textkey}.
Assistance with the liberation of {1_CityName:textkey} no longer needed
The partisans of {1_CityName:textkey} no longer desire your help. As a result, the leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} have revoked their request for assistance.

A horde of barbarians has emerged near {2_MinorCivName:textkey}! If there are barbarians next to the city at the end of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will be sacked[ENDCOLOR]!
The barbarian horde near {1_MinorCivName:textkey} failed to sack the city, and has now dispersed.
Barbarians have established themselves near {1_CityStateName:textkey} and [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]are taking it over[ENDCOLOR]!

Citizens of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} have started a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Citizens of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} have started a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Citizens of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} have started a revolution against their current rulers! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Freedom fighters from {3_MinorCivName:textkey} are leading a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

The proletariat of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} is leading a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Guerilla warriors of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} are leading a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.
The revolutionaries of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} failed, and their morale is now broken.

The revolution in {2_CityStateName:textkey} was successful, and their alliance with {1_TargetName:textkey} has ended. {2_CityStateName:textkey} now looks to other empires for friendship and protection.
The revolution in {1_CityStateName:textkey} has ended. {1_CityStateName:textkey} now looks to other empires for friendship and protection.
Barbarians looted {2_City}, stealing treasures worth {1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold![NEWLINE]Destroy these Barbarians before they steal more stuff!
Barbarians raided {2_City}, destroying relics worth {1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture![NEWLINE]Destroy these Barbarians before they break more stuff!
Barbarians assaulted {2_City}, destroying research materials worth {1_Science} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science![NEWLINE]Destroy these Barbarians before they burn more things!
Barbarians pillaged the stores of {2_City}, taking {1_Food} [ICON_FOOD] Food![NEWLINE]Destroy these Barbarians before they take more stuff!
Barbarians kidnapped citizens from {2_City}, costing the city {1_Production} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production![NEWLINE]Destroy these Barbarians before they cause more panic!

It is now possible to found a Corporation! Check the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporations and Monopolies[ENDCOLOR] screen for information on your current Resource Monopolies, all possible Corporations, and the Corporations that you are eligible for.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Construct the Corporation's HQ in one of your Cities to found it! Remember that you can only found [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]one[ENDCOLOR] Corporation, so make it count!

You have founded [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{@1_CorporationName}[ENDCOLOR]! To spread your new Corporation far and wide, build Corporate Offices in owned Cities and send [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from these Cities to foreign Cities!

{1_PlayerName} has founded [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{@2_CorporationName}[ENDCOLOR]! This Corporation can no longer be established unless the other player's Corporation Headquarters is destroyed (on city capture).
{@2_BldgName} has spread to the City of {@1_City} as a result of a Trade Route with {@3_City}. This will increase the value of all of your Corporate Offices!
{@2_BldgName}, a foreign Corporation, has spread to the City of {@1_City} as a result of a Trade Route with {@3_City}. This will increase the value of their Corporation!
{@2_BldgName} has spread to the City of {@1_City}! This will increase the value of all of your Corporate Offices!
{@2_BldgName}, a foreign Corporation, has spread to the City of {@1_City}! This will increase the value of their Corporation!
{@1_BldgName} has closed all global offices and franchises as a result of their headquarter's untimely destruction.
{@1_BldgName} was forcefully closed by {3_Civ} in {2_City}, due to a Tenet or Resolution!
The effects of an Event have worn off:[NEWLINE]{1_Event}
The effects of an Event in {2_City} have worn off:[NEWLINE]{1_Event}
An Espionage Effect in {1_City} has ended.
The effects of a Spy Missions in {2_City} have ended:[NEWLINE]{1_Event}
The effects of an Espionage Mission against {2_Civ} have ended: Steal {1_MissionResult} per Turn
The effects of a foreign Espionage Mission against you have ended: Steal {1_MissionResult} per Turn
Unknown foreign spies conducted a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Spy Mission[ENDCOLOR] in {1_City}: {2_MissionResult}

{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} was [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]identified and killed[ENDCOLOR] while conducting their mission! Diplomatic relations with {3_CivName} have worsened. It will take some time until a replacement spy is recruited for {1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName}.
{TXT_KEY_GRAMMAR_UPPER_A_AN << {1_CivAdj}} spy was killed in {2_CityName} after they completed a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Spy Mission[ENDCOLOR]: {3_MissionText}
An unidentified foreign spy was killed in {1_CityName} after they completed a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Spy Mission[ENDCOLOR]: {2_MissionText}

{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} was [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]identified[ENDCOLOR] while conducting their mission! Diplomatic relations with {3_CivName} have worsened. {1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} may stay in the city and gather intelligence for another mission.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} has completed their mission and was [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]not detected[ENDCOLOR]. They may stay in the city and gather intelligence for another mission.
The rebellion in {1_City} caused by foreign Spies has ended. The city now generates Tourism again.
The effects of a Spy Mission have ended: Specialists in your Capital produce +1 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per turn.
Upon arriving in {1_City}, {2_SpyRank} {3_SpyName} has detected the presence of an enemy [ICON_SPY] Counterspy! The followings effects are active:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{4_MissionEffect}
A [ICON_SPY] Counterspy has started an operation in {1_City}. The followings effects are now active:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_MissionEffect}
Because the [ICON_SPY] Counterspy in {1_City} has left the city or has changed focus, the following effects are no longer active:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_MissionEffect}

{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} has collected enough Network Points in {3_City} to conduct the following {4_Num: plural 1?Spy Mission; other?Spy Missions;}, if the other mission conditions are fulfilled:[NEWLINE]{5_Missions}
{1_SpyName} has been recruited to serve as a Diplomat in the Capital of your newly acquired Vassal {2_CivName}.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} has collected enough Network Points in {3_City} to unlock the following passive bonuses:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] {4_Missions}
Diplomat {2_SpyName} has collected enough Network Points in {3_City} to unlock the following bonuses:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] {4_Missions}
An Event with multiple options has occurred, and awaits your decision.
The birth of a {1_Resource:textkey} causes the city of {2_CityName:textkey} to enter "We Love the Empress Day." All Cities gain +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Due to the conquest of {4_CityName}, your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] Great Writer Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST] Artist Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{3_Num} [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN] Musician Points
Napoleon stole {1_Num} [ICON_GREAT_WORK] {1_Num: plural 1?Great Work; other?Great Works;} from cities near {2_City} when he conquered it!
You plundered {1_Num} [ICON_GREAT_WORK] {1_Num: plural 1?Great Work; other?Great Works;} from cities near {2_City} after you conquered it!
The conquest of {2_City} has increased your empire's total [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output by {3_Num}% for the next {1_Num} {1_Num: plural 1?turn; other?turns;}!
The conquest of {2_City} has increased the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output of all cities by {3_Num}% for the next {1_Num} {1_Num: plural 1?turn; other?turns;}!
{1_Bully} has forced {2_CS} to surrender by bullying them!
{1_Bully} has forced an unmet City-State to surrender by bullying them!
{1_Bully} has forced a City-State to surrender!
An unmet player has forced {1_CS} to surrender by bullying them!
You forced {1_CS} to surrender through intimidation!
